Module the_project

Package app_guest

package app_guest
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GuestRelated
    This is a Boundary Class; as it is used as a user interface; Allows the user to choose if they want to update their credit card information (choice '1'), Retrieve the Guest information (choice '2'), or access the room service (choice '3') do-while loop is used to ensure that the guest enters a valid choice (1 - 3)
    MakeRoomService
    This is a Boundary Class; as it is used as a user interface; Allows the user to request for room service (which would be redirected to from GuestRelated boundary class upon the selection of choice '3')
